name: Kahala's Macaroni Seafood Salad
author: Kahala
summary: A cool seafood salad for those hot summer days. It's a real treat for potlucks. Use your favorite pasta. Chopped celery or Vidalia onion may be added if desired.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti, broken into 2-inch pieces
½ cup frozen petite peas, thawed
1 cup frozen fully cooked salad shrimp, thawed
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to boil
Add pasta, and cook until al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes
Drain, and add pasta to a large bowl
Stir in eggs, carrots, peas, shrimp, and crab meat
To make dressing, stir together mayonnaise, milk, lemon juice, and sugar
Season to taste with salt, pepper, and paprika
Mix dressing into chilled pasta, stirring until well combined
If the salad seems dry, stir in more mayonnaise and a splash more milk or water
